/opt/fsl-imx-xwayland/4.14-thud/sysroots/x86_64-pokysdk-linux/usr/bin/aarch64-poky-linux/aarch64-poky-linux-g++   --sysroot=/opt/fsl-imx-xwayland/4.14-thud/sysroots/aarch64-poky-linux -O2 -pipe -g -feliminate-unused-debug-types CMakeFiles/program.dir/main.cc.o -o program  pattern/libpattern.a -lpthread
